Question: Generic: Lisinopril
Answer: Brand: Prinivil. Class: ACEi. Indication: Antihypertensive. Schedule: NCLM.

Question: Atorvastatin
Answer: Lipitor, HMG-CoA Reductase Inhibitor, Cholesterol lowering, NCLM

Question: Amiodipine
Answer: Norvasc, Calcium Channel Blocker, Antihypertensive, NCLM

Question: Omeprazole
Answer: Prilosec, PPI, Acid-Reflux/GERD, OTC and NCLM (strength)

Question: Albuterol
Answer: ProAir HFA / Ventolin HFA, Beta agonist, Bronchodilator/asthma, NCLM

Question: Hydrocodone/APAP
Answer: Vicodin/Norco/Lortab, Opioid analgesic combo, Pain reliever, Schedule II

Question: Simvastatin
Answer: Zocor, HMG-CoA Reductase Inhibitor, Cholesterol lowering, NCLM

Question: Gabapentin
Answer: Neurontin, Anticonvulsant, Neuropathic pain/seizures, NCLM (Schedule V in some states)
